actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Hearings Held by the Subcommittee on Capital Markets and Government Sponsored Enterprises Prior to Referral.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Capital Markets and Government Sponsored Enterprises

official_title: To permit business development companies to increase investments in small-and middle-market financial services companies and investment advisors.

summary.text: Business Development Company Modernization Act - Amends the Investment Company Act of 1940 to allow business development companies to invest in: (1) a registered investment adviser or investment adviser to an investment company, or (2) an eligible portfolio company (generally, a small- or middle-market financial service company).

titles.title: To permit business development companies to increase investments in small-and middle-market financial services companies and investment advisors.
